title: Customer Database Management System
description: A comprehensive SQL-based customer management system built with PostgreSQL and Node.js. Implements CRUD operations, data validation, and advanced queries for customer analytics.

title: Inventory Optimization with SQL
description: Developed an inventory tracking system with complex SQL queries for real-time stock monitoring, automated reordering, and supply chain optimization.

title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
description: Built an interactive dashboard using SQL stored procedures to aggregate sales data, generate performance reports, and visualize trends.

title: Database Migration & Optimization
description: Executed migration of legacy MySQL database to PostgreSQL with performance optimization, indexing strategies, and query tuning.
